title: EasyMixer
author: EasyMixer
created_time: June 10, 2022, 05:29:37 AMLast edit: June 10, 2022, 05:44:15 AM by EasyMixer
content: https://i.ibb.co/8Dg6Q7K/Mac-Book-Pro-14-2.pngMany people believe that if you use cryptocurrency as a means of payment, then you are invulnerable and no one will be able to reach you, but I hasten to disappoint you - this is not so. Transaction chains can be traced and you can be held accountable._______________________________________________________________________________ _________________________________________________Therefore, our product will make you invulnerable and elusive. Your coins will be sold on North American, Asian, European exchanges, confused with other coins and sent to you from clean addresses at random times (up to 6-8 hours), in different transactions.This way you get the purest coins that you can sell to the exchanger and not be afraid that they will find any connection with your other address.  You can also choose 2 receiving addresses.The commission for you will be no more than 5% + 0.0007BTC. The minimum amount is 0.003 BTCWhen you create an application, you receive a letter of guarantee that you can provide to us so that we can sort out and resolve your claim, if any.Site: EasyMixer.ruBot in Telegram: @EasyMixer_BotSupport in Telegram: @EasyMixerSupport in Jabber: EasyMixer@exploit.imEmail: EasyMixers@protonmail.comBe anonymous, friends!Note:Use Legacy address starting with "1"

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Be careful with this one. Brand-new site created just two days ago > https://whois.domaintools.com/easymixer.ru.Neither Google nor DuckDuckGo have indexed the website and there are no search results when you run the name through their search engines.ChipMixer requires no cuts and the users pay no fees except the donations they want to send.Not to mention that this platform only works with legacy addresses and doesn't even support nested segwit, let alone native segwit.

comments.author: EasyMixer
comments.body: Quote from: Pmalek on June 10, 2022, 06:48:41 AMBe careful with this one. Brand-new site created just two days ago > https://whois.domaintools.com/easymixer.ru.Neither Google nor DuckDuckGo have indexed the website and there are no search results when you run the name through their search engines.ChipMixer requires no cuts and the users pay no fees except the donations they want to send.Not to mention that this platform only works with legacy addresses and doesn't even support nested segwit, let alone native segwit.Yes, we have recently launched. But we are trying very hard)

comments.author: LeGaulois
comments.created_time: June 10, 2022, 12:38:32 PMLast edit: June 10, 2022, 09:47:12 PM by LeGaulois
comments.body: Q 1: Since 2015... and you just started recently as you say. Where are all the positive reviews located? Especially since nobody knows your website.Q 2: Are you using Jambler API? Because it looks like a white-labelGood luck with your service still.edit 1:Quote from: mocacinno on June 10, 2022, 12:50:01 PM so using their api wouldn't automatically make this one trusted.For sure, but I was just wondering since there is a similarity, hence I askededit 2:Quote from: JeromeTash on June 10, 2022, 09:27:28 PMEverything about the content of your mixer website is just a copy-paste from other mixer websites, and on top of that it's brand new. That's what you can notice on all websites using Jambler (IICRC). It's come from the default "template" provided (IIRC too) It is not necessarily a red flag, here we can say that it is a lack of creativity to differentiate from others.The site is new but people have to start somewhere otherwise nothing will happen. Everyone deserves a chance

comments.author: mocacinno
comments.body: Quote from: LeGaulois on June 10, 2022, 12:38:32 PMsince 2015... and you just started recently as you say. Where are all the positive reviews located? Especially since nobody knows your website.Are you using Jambler API? Because it looks like a white-labelGood luck with your service still.It's not listed on https://[banned mixer]/mix-coins.php, so i guess he's either brand new, or he's not using jambler? That being said, i'm not a big fan of jambler anyways, so using their api wouldn't automatically make this one trusted.

comments.author: JeromeTash
comments.body: Everything about the content of your mixer website is just a copy-paste from other mixer websites, and on top of that it's brand new. It doesn't in any single bit add confidence to the potential users, does it?Archived: https://archive.ph/7EnkY

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Bitcoin mixers are in the business of trust. Anything they say should be 100% true. Users can't possibly verify if they don't keep records, and have to do with the information that's publicly available. If you lie on your website, we can only assume you lie about privacy too.Quote from: EasyMixer on June 10, 2022, 07:22:13 AMQuote from: Pmalek on June 10, 2022, 06:48:41 AMBe careful with this one. Brand-new site created just two days ago > https://whois.domaintools.com/easymixer.ru.Yes, we have recently launched.So what's this about?QuoteBut we are trying very hard)You made a typo: you are lying very hard. And that's enough to never trust you.

comments.author: Pmalek
comments.body: Quote from: JeromeTash on June 10, 2022, 09:27:28 PMEverything about the content of your mixer website is just a copy-paste from other mixer websites, and on top of that it's brand new. They might be brand-new but they have been in business for 7 years and have dozens of positive feedback to their name despite launching just a few days ago. Quote from: LoyceV on June 11, 2022, 07:26:11 AMYou made a typo: you are lying very hard. And that's enough to never trust you. But, but, they give you a letter of guarantee when you mix with them. They guarantee that everything will be OK LoyceV. It's more than saying I swear to God! What can possible go wrong if you have an official letter of guarantee?

comments.author: LoyceV
comments.body: Quote from: Pmalek on June 11, 2022, 07:58:47 AMBut, but, they give you a letter of guarantee when you mix with them. They guarantee that everything will be OK LoyceV. It's more than saying I swear to God! What can possible go wrong if you have an official letter of guarantee? I really don't get this: the mixing industry is very profitable and charging 5% is very expensive compared to the competition. That should be more than enough to start a honest business, and yet, most of the new mixers make it so obvious they're not honest and look like they'll exit scam the moment the opportunity presents itself.

comments.author: SFR10
comments.body: Quote from: EasyMixer on June 10, 2022, 05:29:37 AMNote:Use Legacy address starting with "1"Care to explain why there's no error when other formats [e.g. P2SH and P2WPKH] are used and why on earth there's no mention of this on the "mixing" page?Quote from: LoyceV on June 11, 2022, 08:11:22 AMthe mixing industry is very profitable and charging 5% is very expensive compared to the competition.To make matters worse, there's also a "0.0007BTC" fee...

comments.author: DireWolfM14
comments.body: There are quite a few similarities between this service and Mixsafer, which is starting to look a lot like an exit scam.  Is it merely a coincidence that this service pops up with a two-day old URL as people start to question Mixsafer's honesty?  Being a cynical skeptic, I say that's too coincidental to be coincidence.

comments.author: LTU_btc
comments.body: In recent months I tend to not trust in things which comes from RU. And you didn't managed to start your service in positive way. You'we been trusted since 2015, but you launched just recently. You contradicting yourself. Things doesn't looks good.Tell me at least one reason, why I should risk my BTC and try your service when there is at least several trusted mixers in the market.

comments.author: dkbit98
comments.body: Quote from: EasyMixer on June 10, 2022, 07:22:13 AMYes, we have recently launched. But we are trying very hard)Yes, it looks like you are trying very hard to scam as much people as possible...Aside from lying that you are operating for several years, you are also lying that nobody can access encrypted data, and that you are faster than competition, well maybe you are scamming faster.I would suggest everyone to stay away from this away from this website, and don't risk sending them s single satoshi cent.
